title: Herding Cows Tips Secrets for Happy and Healthy Livestock

tasks.task: Assist in driving a four-wheeler with a box tied to the back.
subtasks: Sit on the four-wheeler.
Grab the box located in the back.
Secure the box onto the four-wheeler.
Drive the four-wheeler to a specific location.

tasks.task: Load a bag of fertilizer into a four-wheeler.
subtasks: Approach the four-wheeler.
Open the four-wheeler's cargo area.
Pick up the bag of fertilizer.
Place the bag into the four-wheeler's cargo area.

tasks.task: Operate a four-wheeler on a farm.
subtasks: Drive a four-wheeler through a field.
Maneuver the four-wheeler around obstacles.
Apply fertilizer or chemicals to crops using the four-wheeler.
Check the condition of crops from the four-wheeler.

tasks.task: Apply fertilizer or chemicals to crops using a four-wheeler.
subtasks: Secure the fertilizer/bTcp on the four-wheeler.
Drive the four-wheeler to the field.
Deploy the fertilizer applicator.
Walk through the field, ensuring even coverage.
Return the four-wheeler to its original location.

tasks.task: Demonstrate how to tie a bag to the back of a four-wheeler.
subtasks: Select a bag to tie.
Fasten the bag tightly to the four-wheeler's back.
Check the tie for stability while driving.

tasks.task: Ride a four-wheeler with a bag tied to the back.
subtasks: Sit comfortably on the four-wheeler.
Ensure the bag is securely attached.
Operate the four-wheeler through various terrains.

tasks.task: Deliver a product (e.g., fertilizer) using a four-wheeler.
subtasks: Load the product into the four-wheeler's cargo area.
Navigate the four-wheeler to the delivery location.
Discharge the product at the destination.

tasks.task: Secure a fertilizer bag on a four-wheeler for transport.
subtasks: Place the fertilizer bag on the four-wheeler.
Wrap or strap the bag to prevent movement.
Inspect the securement before departure.

tasks.task: Drive a four-wheeler across a field.
subtasks: Enter the field on the four-wheeler.
Drive in a straight line or pattern across the field.
Monitor the equipment's operation during movement.

tasks.task: Attach a bag to the back of a four-wheeler.
subtasks: Position the bag at the back of the four-wheeler.
Use appropriate fasteners (e.g., straps) to attach the bag.
Tighten the fasteners securely.

tasks.task: Prepare a four-wheeler for transport with a load.
subtasks: Check the four-wheeler's condition.
Load the desired item (e.g., fertilizer bag) securely.
Secure any additional materials.
Pre-trip inspection of the four-wheeler.

tasks.task: Apply a fertilizer bag to a four-wheeler's back during transit.
subtasks: Harness the fertilizer bag so it doesn't shift while moving.
Fasten the bag onto the four-wheeler's rear rack.
Balance the weight for even distribution.

tasks.task: Use a four-wheeler for transportation on a farm.
subtasks: Travel from one point to another on the farm.
Use the four-wheeler to transport farm supplies.
Safely operate the four-wheeler on farm roads.

tasks.task: Transport a bag of fertilizer using a four-wheeler.
subtasks: Transfer the bag from a storage area to the four-wheeler.
Load the bag onto the four-wheeler's back.
Drive the four-wheeler to the application area.
Unload the bag at the desired location.
